casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Meyers, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Meyers, 118 Ohio St.3d 264, 2008-Ohio-2541.]

(No. 2007-0844 Submitted April 23, 2008 Decided June 4, 2008.) Joseph T. Deters, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and Scott M. Heenan, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The certified question is answered in the affirmative and the judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Cabrales, 118 Ohio St.3d 54, 2008-Ohio-1625, 886 N.E.2d 181.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
